ygData.subject: Re: graphics bug?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep.  I wondered the same thing and asked a GM.  Its been a known bug for awhile.  Funny thing is you can see them on female barbarians. Angarth,  Clan
ygData.messageBody:
Yep. I wondered the same thing and asked a GM. Its been
a known bug for awhile. Funny thing is you can see them
on female barbarians.

Angarth, Clan Anstruther, Warrior of the 15th Tier
"Periissem ni periisem"
